title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Solve Dilemmas for Mr. Faber’s Clients and Get Double Rewards
content:
The evasive puppeteer behind Southern San Andreas' money laundering syndicate requires your assistance. Locate lost valuables, sabotage enemy outfits, and more in Mr. Faber Work — in exchange for 2X GTA$ and RP.

Mr. Faber is an avowed fan of multiplying return on investment, so payouts also stack up to 4X for GTA+ Members this week. Plus, additionally compensate yourself with a GTA$100,000 bonus for completing five Mr. Faber Work Missions to fulfill the Weekly Challenge.
